name: Zoho Inventory Login via Google Search
description: Search for Zoho Inventory on Google and complete the login process

steps.name: Search for Zoho Inventory
steps.ai_instruction: Search for 'zoho inventory' in Google search box

steps.name: Click Zoho Inventory link
steps.ai_instruction: Click on the Zoho Inventory link in search results

steps.name: Click Sign In button
steps.ai_instruction: Click the Sign In button on Zoho Inventory homepage

steps.name: Enter email
steps.ai_instruction: Enter email address in the login form

steps.name: Click Next
steps.ai_instruction: Click Next or Continue button after entering email

steps.name: Wait for password field
steps.ai_instruction: Wait for password field to become visible

steps.name: Enter password
steps.ai_instruction: Enter password in the password field

steps.name: Complete login
steps.ai_instruction: Click Sign In button to complete the login
steps.snippet: await page.click('button[id="nextbtn"], button:has-text("Sign in"), button:has-text("Sign In")');

steps.name: Wait for dashboard
steps.ai_instruction: Wait for Zoho Inventory dashboard to load
